I would dream about exploring new and uncharted territories, embarking on exciting adventures, and discovering hidden treasures.
I would dream about traveling back in time to witness historical events firsthand and interact with famous figures from the past.
I would dream about living in a world where I have superpowers and can use them to help others and make a positive impact on the world.
I would dream about being able to time travel and visit different eras, cultures, and civilizations to learn more about their ways of life and history.
I would dream about being able to fly and soar through the skies, experiencing the freedom and exhilaration of being weightless and free to explore the world from a bird's eye view.
